title: How to get Three.js Shader Source Code at Runtime
How to Make Your Pull Requests Reviewer-friendly
description: Have you ever opened a pull request and been stuck on filling out the description? Do you feel like you could be getting more out of your code reviews? If so, the tips in this post are for you.
